entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
